title: Enacts the "automated external defibrillators access act"
summary: Enacts the "automated external defibrillators access act"; requires all public buildings, stadiums, arenas and convention centers in cities with a population of over one million to be equipped with automated external defibrillators; requires employees to be trained in the use of such devices.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public buildings law and the public health law, in relation to enacting the "automated external defibrillators access act"
